articles.author: Afifah Darke
articles.title: SEA Games in Vietnam postponed amid rising COVID-19 cases - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: This year's Southeast Asian Games due to take place in Vietnam has been postponed to 2022.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE: This year's Southeast Asian Games due to take place in Vietnam has been postponed to 2022. 
"The SEA Games Federation working committee met today and it was decided that the SEA Games wil… [+2911 chars]

articles.title: Gilas eyes pocket tourney before Asia Cup - Manila Bulletin
articles.content:
Coach Tab Baldwin is hoping to secure an overseas pocket tournament for Gilas Pilipinas before its campaign in the FIBA Asia Cup next month in Jakarta, Indonesia.

articles.title: Super Junior's Hee-chul and Twice's Momo break up - AsiaOne
articles.description: They were the first celeb couple to be announced in 2020 but K-pop's Momo Hirai and Kim Hee-chul are no longer together. The singers' management agencies responded to media queries today (July 8), after a South Korean news outlet ran a report quoting an anony…
articles.content:
